'''Version 5.4 "Event Calendar"''' is a [[Web Event]] in [[Version 5.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* February 7 – February 19 23:59 (UTC+8)

===Event Rules===
====Pre-Registration Event====
* During the event, you can participate in the pre-registration event by clicking the "Pre-Register" button. Pre-registration rewards will be sent via in-game mail after the "Enchanted Tales of the Mikawa Festival" event begins in-game.
* Each account can only receive the rewards once.

====Share Event====
* Click the share button in the top-right corner of the event calendar to claim the sharing reward.
* Each account can only receive the rewards once.
